title: 服务器一进去就掉
author: 蓝颜哟
txt_content:
显示Internal Exception:io.netty.handler.coder.DecoderExecption:java.long.RuntimeExecption:Tried to read NBT tag that was too big;tried to allocate:2097156bytes where max allowed:2097152

翻译内部异常: io.netty.handler.coder.decoderexecption : java.long.runtimeexecption:尝试读取太大的NBT标签；尝试分配: 2097156bytes，其中允许最大值: 2097152

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
某些方块或实体的NBT标签超过能读取的长度
尝试移除方块/实体
一进去就掉说明这个是在玩家进入的区块
把那个区块文件重置掉
第一眼看过去这是个mod服务器？！

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 原因：Tried to read NBT tag that was too big（翻译：试图读取NBT标签但是NBT标签太大了。）

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content:
吕易天 发表于 2017-8-20 10:29
原因：Tried to read NBT tag that was too big（翻译：试图读取NBT标签但是NBT标签太大了。） ...
补充：内存分配不够的问题。
